text: Aaron Neville (born January 24, 1941) is an American R&B; and soul music singer. He has had four platinum studio albums and four Top 10 hits in the United States. Three songs hit #1 on the Billboard's Adult Contemporary chart. Neville is the uncle of Fox News and television personality Arthel Neville. Neville was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:African-American singers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American soul musicians Category:Singers from New Orleans Category:Living people Category:20th-century Roman Catholics Category:21st- century Roman Catholics
title: Aaron Neville
